thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Belle Paris
thread.title_full: Belle Paris - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bernard R
title: Belle Paris
text:
We have just arrived home after a wonderful 3 day visit to Paris, the city of lights.
What an experience.
From this lovely hotel, so well appointed, with its great ambience, staff so pleasant and every facility one requires to a memorable visit to The Louvre, a visit we hope to repeat soon.
We loved every minute of our stay.
Breakfast was excellent with staff so helpful and obliging.
The room, ours was 411, Was spotless, bright, comfortable and with a bathroom that was so big and had every facility.
There was any amount of Bistros and restaurants close by, all excellent value, our favourite was The Louvre Brasserie.
Au revoir Paris, a bientot, till we see you again, Merci
Room Tip: Ours was room 411, so tranquil, amazing. See more room tips
